golden ratio of passion. sansogno.coastaldisturbance.com

The book is by [Otl Aicher](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021045823/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Otl%252BAicher)... that shudda been a dead giveaway!

FYI— the book was originally typeset using a pre-released version of Aicher’s Rotis. After we got it at Agfa-Cg (Monotype Imaging) we did a lot of re-tooling the outlines and spacing (with the blessing of Herr Aicher).
